trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see langword="LoadGrammarCompleted" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> 对象的 <see langword="LoadGrammarCompleted" /> 事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: An instance of `LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs` is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object raises its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType> or the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> object raises its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 实例`LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs`时，将创建<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>对象引发其<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>对象引发其<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarCompleted>事件。

trans-unit.source: The events are raised when calls to the `LoadGrammarAsync` methods complete.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时调用`LoadGrammarAsync`方法完成。

trans-unit.source: To obtain information about the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object that was loaded, access the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs.Grammar%2A> property in the handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取有关的信息<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>已加载的对象、 访问<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs.Grammar%2A>事件的处理程序中的属性。

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer encounters an exception during the operation, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property is set to the exception and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Loaded%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> may be `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果识别器遇到操作期间的异常<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>属性设置为异常和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Loaded%2A>属性关联的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>可能`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a shared speech recognizer, and then creates two types of grammars for recognizing specific words and for accepting free dictation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建共享的语音识别器，，，然后创建两种类型的语法，用于识别特定的词和接受免费听写。

trans-unit.source: The example asynchronously loads all the created grammars to the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 本示例以异步方式加载到识别器创建的所有语法。

trans-unit.source: Handlers for the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarCompleted> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> events report the results of recognition and which grammar was used to perform the recognition.
trans-unit.target: 处理程序识别器<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarCompleted>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized>事件报告识别和哪些语法用于执行识别的结果。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar" /> object that has completed loading.
The <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar" /> that was loaded by the recognizer.

If the recognizer encounters an exception during the operation, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property is set to the exception and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Loaded%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> may be `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果识别器遇到操作期间的异常<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>属性设置为异常和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Loaded%2A>属性关联的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>可能`false`。
